official_title: A bill to authorize the planning and construction of the Mid-Dakota Rural Water System, and for other purposes.
short_title: Mid-Dakota Rural Water System Act of 1989
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Mid-Dakota Rural Water System Act of 1989 - Authorizes appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for planning and construction of a rural water treatment and distribution system in portions of specified counties in South Dakota. Prohibits the Secretary from obligating any Federal funds for the construction of such system until the Secretary finds that appropriate non-Federal interests have implemented water conservation programs throughout the system's service area. Provides for mitigation of fish and wildlife losses incurred as a result of the construction and operation of the system. Directs the Administrator of the Western Area Power Administration to make available, from power designated for future irrigation and drainage pumping for the Pick-Sloan Missouri River Basin Program and subject to certain conditions, the capacity and energy required to meet the pumping requirements of such system.

titles.title: Mid-Dakota Rural Water System Act of 1989
A bill to authorize the planning and construction of the Mid-Dakota Rural Water System, and for other purposes.
